Files Headings

svgo

 
#!/usr/bin/env node

const colors = require('picocolors');
const { program } = require('commander');
const makeProgram = require('../lib/svgo/coa');
makeProgram(program);
program.parseAsync(process.argv).catch(error => {
  console.error(colors.red(error.stack));
  process.exit(1);
});
